title: Weekly Report Management
submitReminderMessage: Please submit your weekly report in a visible location on the web
notSubmittedYet: The report for week {{weekStart}} has not been submitted yet. Please enter your report using the form below.
preFilled: Last week's report content has been pre-filled. Please edit the content and save it as this week's report.

form.contentPlaceholder: Please describe the work you performed this week
form.achievementsPlaceholder: Please describe what you accomplished this week
form.challengesPlaceholder: Please describe any challenges or issues you faced
form.nextWeekPlanPlaceholder: Please describe the work you plan to do next week

overview.title: Overview (Concise Report for Department Sharing)
overview.description: AI will automatically generate a concise overview from the detailed report above. You can edit the content after generation.
overview.placeholder: Click 'Generate Overview' button to auto-generate with AI
overview.helperText: Please review and edit the content before saving your report
overview.requireContent: Please enter report content before generating overview
overview.generateSuccess: Overview generated successfully. Please review and edit the content.

memberList.title: Member Weekly Reports (Last 3 Weeks)
memberList.clickToView: * Click on a member to view detailed report content

memberDetail.title: Weekly Report History
memberDetail.scrollNote: * Scroll horizontally to view past reports. Displayed in chronological order from left (newest) to right.

export.title: Excel Export
export.filterNote: * If no filter is specified, all data will be exported
